path /v3/bsc/transaction
opid bscblockchaintransfer
params None
sum send bsc / bep20 from account to account
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
data
type string
maxlength 50000
desc only for bsc transactions additional data that can be passed to a blockchain transaction as a data property must be in the hexadecimal format
nonce
type number
minimum 0
desc nonce to be set to bsc transaction if not present last known nonce will be used
to
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 42
minlength 42
type string
currency
desc currency to transfer from bsc blockchain account bep20 tokens like beth bbtc bada wbnb bdot bxrp bltc bbch cake are available only for mainnet use
enum
bsc
beth
bbtc
rmd
usdcbsc
b2ubsc
bada
wbnb
gmcbsc
bdot
bxrp
bltc
bbch
hag
cake
busdbsc
type string
fee
desc the custom defined fee if not present will be calculated automatically
type object
required
gaslimit
gasprice
props
gasprice
type string
desc the price for one gas unit in gwei
pattern d
gaslimit
type string
desc the maximum number of gas units that you are willing to spend on processing the transaction at the provided gas price
pattern d
schName customfee
amount
desc amount to be sent
pattern ddd
type string
fromprivatekey
type string
maxlength 66
minlength 66
desc private key of sender address private key or signature id must be present
required
to
amount
currency
fromprivatekey
schName transferbscblockchain

path /v3/bsc/broadcast
opid bscbroadcast
params None
sum broadcast signed bsc transaction
reqBody
schema broadcastkms
props
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign required only when broadcasting transaction signed by tatum kms
format uuid
type string
index
desc only if the signature id is mnemonicbased and you run kms v62 or later the index of the address to send the assets from that was generated from the mnemonic
type number
minimum 0
maximum 2147483647
required
txdata
type object
